body:
I need some recording software. My Action trial ran out, and Fraps screws up my dpi. Any suggestions for recording software? 

If someone can get me a working Action crack or another software besides fraps that is good for recording, I can either teach you a bit on how to PvP, or another thing we can discuss over Skype, which I'll give out if needed. 

Also, Idk what to upload on my channel due to recent lag. I was thinking of making a "Laggy PvP" vid or recording some Osu! or OCN for my channel. Any suggestions? As long as it's 60fps I'm fine.
body_tagged:

title: Recording Software + Offer

replies.body: OBS (Open Broadcaster Software)
replies.body_tagged: OBS (Open Broadcaster Software)

replies.body: Does OBS record at 60 fps? I'm looking for a program which records at 60 fps and into mp4 format. AVI takes up far too much space.
replies.body_tagged: Does OBS record at 60 fps? I'm looking for a program which records at 60 fps and into mp4 format. AVI takes up far too much space.

replies.body:
I don't want to use fraps cuz it screws up my dpi and aim with it. That's the issue. I get no lag recording with it, but the aim screwing up is kinda bad for a PvP channel, as the most important part of PvP is aim. 

Ty for the suggestion though :)
